Can I use the `listopenoffers` command to filter out expired or unexpired offers?

Yes, you can use the `unexpired` and `expired` arguments to filter out either expired or unexpired offers from the list. For example, if you only want to see unexpired offers, you can set `expired` to `false`.

listopenoffers (unexpired) (expired)'

Shows offers outstanding in this wallet

Arguments
 unexpired        (bool, optional) default=true, list those offers in the wallet which are not expired
 expired         (bool, optional) default=true, list those offers in the wallet which are expired

Result
 all open offers
